Name: AteloPhobia:The Story Begins
About the game: AteloPhobia is a game with elements of Point&Click, RPG and horror. Something is hiding in the basement of the house... And it's definitely not rats.As you descend, you begin your terrifying and deadly adventure. Go through the creepy places! Find the REAL story! Will you make it out of the basement alive?
